title: Google Play Store users in Russia won’t be able to buy apps, games in the coming days
content:
Google this evening informed Android developers that Play Store users in Russia will soon lose the ability to purchase apps, games, IAPs, and subscriptions.

more…

The post Google Play Store users in Russia won’t be able to buy apps, games in the coming days appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google today told Android app developers that Play Store users in Russia will soon no longer be able to purchase apps, games, subscriptions...
